Link [here](https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/monkey-cage/wp/2018/12/10/is-protest-a-safety-valve-against-isis-in-tunisia/?utm_term=.c26bc6b1dc5f) to the *Washington Post Monkey Cage* [blog](https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/monkey-cage/?utm_term=.713e2d9ba0fa) post Neil and I wrote re our findings on protest and ISIS in Tunisia. While graduate unemployment is a positive predictor of recruitment, we find suggestive evidence that protest might function to insulate individuals against the pull of ISIS.
